name: Mau Card Game
description:
All important informations about the game and tutorials are available under the homepage http://maucardgame.weebly.com/.

At the start the game is like UNO without special rules.
It changes when a player win a game and add a rule.
This rules must be placed in the local Scripts/ Folder or
online created in the userinterface http://maucardgame.bplaced.net/login.php.

When you have questions, proposals or want to say something please write it in the forum below.

Feel free to make a video about the game.
